bug.title: Transaction details screen footer disappears
bug.description:
#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour 1. Click on existing transaction 1. Click on edit transaction FAB 1. Click on splits icon 1. Add a split 1. Click "save" 1. Click "save" again
#### Expected behaviour Footer visible.
#### Actual behaviour Footer removed (balance and date).
#### Software specifications * GnuCash Android version: 2.2.0 * System Android version: 6.0 * Device type: Any
